notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!

taskDescription: The cyclitols are a group of carbocyclic sugar derivatives having the general formulation 1,2,3,4,5,6-cyclohexanehexol. How many stereoisomeric cyclitols are possible? Draw them in their chair forms.
